title: Riot person help me..
body: Will your account refresh it's ban strike timer if you never play on that account again?

replies.body: Not really.  :/  Time can help a little, but the key factor here is games played.  You'll want to consistently play without behavioral occurrences to climb down the [Instant Feedback System's](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207489286-Instant-Feedback-System-FAQ-) ladder.  If you take a break without showing reform, your standing with the system would likely remain in a pretty poor spot.
